services.name: Patios
services.title: Patio Installation
services.description: Transform your outdoor space with a stunning new patio. We specialise in porcelain paving, Indian sandstone, and natural stone patios built to last.
features: Bespoke designs to suit your garden

services.name: Driveways
services.title: Driveway Installation
services.description: Quality driveway installations that improve your home's kerb appeal. From block paving to resin driveways, we deliver lasting results.

services.name: Fencing
services.title: Fencing Installation
services.description: Professional fencing installation using concrete posts and gravel boards. Built properly to stand the test of time.

services.name: Decking
services.title: Decking Installation
services.description: Create an outdoor living space with quality decking. We install composite and timber decking with proper sub-frames and drainage.

services.name: Turfing & Lawns
services.title: Turfing & Lawn Installation
services.description: Professional lawn installation using premium turf. From tired old lawns to lush green spaces, we handle the complete job.

services.name: Garden Renovations
services.title: Complete Garden Renovations
services.description: Complete garden makeovers tailored to your space and budget. From design to completion, we transform tired gardens into stunning outdoor spaces.

services.name: Walls & Brickwork
services.title: Garden Walls & Brickwork
services.description: Expert brick and stonework for retaining walls, raised beds, and decorative features. Built to last with quality materials.

services.name: Drainage Solutions
services.title: Garden Drainage
services.description: Effective drainage systems to protect your property. From simple soakaways to comprehensive surface water management.
